numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that many countries were above the line.
2. Younger people tended to have a more positive outlook for the future than older people.
3. I ask what the graph looked like 20 years in the past.
4. I ask what the graph looked like 40 years in the past.
5. I ask what the graph looked like 60 years in the past.
6. I ask what the graph will look like in the future.
7. I ask how Indonesia manages to give happiness to young people and old people.
8. This relates to me and my community.
9. From this graph, I can see how the coming generations see the world.
10. From this graph, I can see how the past generations see the world.
11. I ask if there are better days ahead for young people and old people.
